resources.string: Now swipe for the fun stuff!
1 Altuve = 5 feet 5 inches after Jose Altuve, one of the shortest players in MLB!
Forget the LightYear! The BeardSecond is the length a beard grows in one earth second. Equal to about 10nm.
The furlong is the length of a furrow of a plowed field which in turn is the length a team of oxen could plow without needing a smoke break. Equal to 40 rods, 10 chains or 201m for you and me.
An Oxgang was the amount of land tillable by one ox in a ploughing season. This could vary from village to village, but was typically around 15 acres.
The standard FIFA football pitch is 105 m (344 ft) long by 68 m (223 ft) wide (7,140 m2 or 0.714 ha or 1.76 acres)

The Barn is a nuclear physics expression for the size of a uranium nucleus with regards to the difficult in colliding particles and the old idiom couldnt hit the broad side of a barn. (1 Barn = 10e-28 m2)
